entry.title: Sardo - Concentrated Basil Pesto - 1.4 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sardo
Type: FOOD
Price: 21.49

Sardo - Concentrated Basil Pesto - 1.4 Kg Cooler Item

Thick, rich, and decadently creamy, use this sauce to bring authentic flavor to your dishes without the prep work. This smooth, cheesy sauce is the perfect addition to virtually any menu with its fresh, authentic ingredients and rich, wholesome goodness.

Use to offer classic pasta dishes like fettuccine, stirring in buttered shrimp or grilled chicken for added protein, and steamed broccoli to create a tasty, well-balanced entree that is a crowd-favorite.

This sauce also works well for white pizzas as a creamy, extra cheesy base, using to coat mild-tasting vegetables like cauliflower prior to roasting for added flavor, or it can be used as a base to create an dip that is perfect for drizzling on soft pretzels to serve as a satisfying appetizer. No matter how you choose to use it, this sauce is sure to have your customers savoring every bite!

Add the refreshing flavour of sweet basil to your creations as a spread or ingredient in pastas, salads, soups, and more.Individual portion packs available in the refrigerated section of your local grocery store or glass jars on your grocers’ shelf.

entry.title: Cedar Creek - Garlic Sauce - 375 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cedar Creek
Type: FOOD
Price: 5.99

Cedar Creek - Garlic Sauce - 375 g

Garlic sauce is a sauce prepared using garlic as a primary ingredient. It is typically a pungent sauce, with the depth of garlic flavor determined by the amount of garlic used. The garlic is typically crushed or finely diced. Simple garlic sauce is composed of garlic and another ingredient to suspend the tuber via emulsion, such as oil, butter or mayonnaise. Various additional ingredients can be used to prepare the sauce.

Garlic sauce can be used to add flavor to many foods and dishes, such as steak, fish, seafood, mutton, chops, chicken, eggs and vegetables. It is also used as a condiment.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Delmare
Type: FOOD
Price: 31.99

Delmare - Garlic Spread - 4 Kg

In spread form, Garlic applied to breads, buns or baguettes offers an alternative method from which one can benefit from the taste and health benefits of Garlic. Our, roasted garlic spread is softer, easily spreadable and mellower than fresh garlic. It can add richness and flavour to pasta, potatoes, dips, or as a spread on bread or buns.

entry.title: Aladdin Dips - Garlic Sauce - 48 x 68 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aladdin
Type: FOOD
Price: 31.99

Our thick and creamy garlic sauce dip is packed with flavor and is a must-have with grilled meats.

A must-have condiment for fried favorites like fried chicken, shrimp, fish sticks, and crab cakes, this sauce will deliver just the right amount of bold flavor! Quickly and easily enhance your seafood dishes with the zesty taste of this classic condiment. Bursting with flavor, this sauce is the perfect fusion of sweet pickle relish and creamy mayonnaise peppered with savory onion powder, herbs, and spices. Made from natural ingredients, this sauce will delight your customers with the classic taste they know and love.

The texture of Garlic Dip is slightly thicker than other sauces. It has a creamy consistency that tastes cool and tangy over grilled or pan-fried chicken, fish and deep fried foods. Save the hassle and kitchen prep time mixing sauce from scratch with this packet that is ready to serve! It still has a homemade taste that's sure to please your seafood-loving patrons. Spice up the menu offerings at your restaurant or diner, and offer this rich, creamy, zesty sauce.

Enhance the flavor of virtually any recipe with the iconic taste of these packets! Its rich, thick consistency is perfect for dipping or spreading while its versatile taste is perfect for complementing a variety of dishes and appetizers. These packets are great for offering at convenience stores, catered events, on the go and quick-service eateries, and allow you to eliminate condiment pumps and portion cups at your self-serve condiment stations to enhance the convenience for your customers and effectively minimize product waste and cleanup of your counters.

Canola Oil, Lemon Juice, Garlic, Egg Yolk, Corn Starch, Salt, Vinegar, Oregano.

Aladdin Dips - Garlic Sauce - 3.5 Kg

entry.title: Aladdin Dips - Basil And Garlic Hummus Dip - 283 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aladdin
Type: FOOD
Price: 4.29

Add Mediterranean flavor to any dish with this classic hummus.

Boasting a creamy texture and traditional flavor, this hummus is made from chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and spices. Hummus tastes great on its own as a dip or added to sandwiches and wraps for added protein and flavor. Serve this hummus with warm pita bread for a classic appetizer or add fresh carrots, celery, broccoli, and cauliflower to a platter for a veggie tray your guests will love. You can even add a generous layer of hummus to a spinach wrap and add grilled chicken, juicy tomatoes, crisp lettuce, and sliced olives for a lunch entree as colorful as it is delicious.

Buy in Bulk tub, you can use this hummus at the back of the house to plate appetizers and build sandwiches and wraps. Premade and ready to use, hummus helps you save valuable prep time in your kitchen. Plus, the lid seals in freshness in between use so you can serve your customers a quality, flavorful dip or spread.

entry.title: AAA - Tzatziki Sauce - 1.5 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: AAA
Type: FOOD
Price: 13.99

AAA -  Regular Tzatziki Sauce - 1.5 Kg

Light and refreshing! 

Tzatziki sauce is the perfect blend of cucumber, garlic, and a zing of lemon juice. It's also lusciously creamy, made with milk and coconut oil to give it its traditional smooth, silky texture. This classic Mediterranean sauce pairs especially well with crisp, crunchy, or juicy ingredients.


To keep things simple, smother it on a roasted chickpea, lamb, or beef gyro. Or treat it as a dipping sauce; serve it in a small dish with an order of freshly-baked pita, an appetizer of bite-sized falafel, or even an entree of grilled chicken kebabs with lemon. For a creative, Mediterranean twist, mix the tzatziki sauce with avocado and spoon on salmon, serve with grilled lamb leg in place of mint pesto, or dollop on a Mediterranean-style loaded potato. However you serve it, this decadent cream sauce provides bright, fresh flavor that's sure to enhance a variety of mouthwatering meals.

TZATZIKI, IS A SAUCE SERVED WITH GRILLED MEATS OR AS A DIP. OUR TZATZIKI BASE IS MADE WITH OUR AUTHENTIC PRESSED YOGURT. IT IS MADE WITH OUR PRESSED YOGURT MIXED WITH CUCUMBERS, GARLIC, SALT, OLIVE OIL, SOMETIMES WITH VINEGAR OR LEMON JUICE, AND SOME HERBS LIKE DILL, MINT, PARSLEY, THYME ETC. IT IS GENERALLY SERVED AS A COLD MEZE. 
Our original Tzatziki is a classic authentic Mediterranean dip. Amazing with pita, chips, vegetables and even dressings for salad. AAA Tzatziki is a favourite for Souvlaki/Gyros of all types and is a perfect complement to many dishes.

Triple “A” Cheese has created a bright and fresh Tzatziki for your business. Our family recipe is made with extra thick and creamy 100% Yogurt that is made in-house. A splash of vinegar, a bit of garlic, some fragrant dill make this a great dip or serve it alongside meat or vegetables.

Ingredients: Ultra-filtered milk • Milk protein concentrate • Cream • Cucumber • Garlic puree • Canola oil • Salt • White vinegar • Dill • White pepper • Bacterial culture

entry.title: Star - Alfredo Sauce Extra Creamy - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Star
Type: FOOD
Price: 49.99

Star - Alfredo Sauce Extra Creamy - 4 L

Thick, rich, and decadently creamy, use this Star alfredo sauce to bring authentic flavor to your dishes without the prep work. Boasting a luscious blend of aged parmesan, cream, and romano cheese that is seasoned with ground black pepper for added flavor, this smooth, cheesy sauce is the perfect addition to virtually any menu with its fresh, authentic ingredients and rich, wholesome goodness. Use to offer classic pasta dishes like fettuccine alfredo, stirring in buttered shrimp or grilled chicken for added protein, and steamed broccoli to create a tasty, well-balanced entree that is a crowd-favorite.

This sauce also works well for white pizzas as a creamy, extra cheesy base, using to coat mild-tasting vegetables like cauliflower prior to roasting for added flavor, or it can be used as a base to create an alfredo dip that is perfect for drizzling on soft pretzels to serve as a satisfying appetizer. No matter how you choose to use it, this alfredo sauce is sure to have your customers savoring every bite!

Delivering a scratch-quality sauce on demand, this sauce effectively reduces prep time in your kitchen without compromising great flavor. This alfredo sauce should first be heated to an internal temperature of 165 degrees Fahrenheit prior to service. After thawing, simply boil it in water or steam it in a low-pressure steamer for 55 to 60 minutes. Then, generously douse the sauce on a hearty, meat entree, pasta bowl, or other delicious dish, and serve!
